Primary goal: Reducing the risks of harm from environmental hazards
From Indicator: F2 Communities resilient to flooding or coastal erosion
To Indicator: F1 Disruption or unwanted impacts from flooding or coastal erosion
Rationale: Resilience reduces the disruption caused by flooding and coastal erosion.

Primary goal: Reducing the risks of harm from environmental hazards
From Indicator: B6 Natural functions of water and wetland ecosystems
To Indicator: F1 Disruption or unwanted impacts from flooding or coastal erosion
Rationale: Restoring natural functions to wetland ecosystems contributes to enhancing ecosystem services such as the provision of clean water and flood regulation.

Primary goal: Reducing the risks of harm from environmental hazards
To Indicator: F1 Disruption or unwanted impacts from flooding or coastal erosion
Rationale: Healthy soils underpin the multiple functions of soils in regulating water

Primary goal: Reducing the risks of harm from environmental hazards
To Indicator: F3 Disruption or unwanted impacts caused by drought
Rationale: Reducing water consumption and leakage will mitigate the impacts of drought.
